content: I'm relieved that you managed to find a proper place for Frostia to settle down. Mobai is waiting at the Camp, time to head back.
info: 围炉煮茶-莎莎_主流程文本

content:
If you can't find the map,
look for the <color=#38b6c5>phone icon in the top right</color>,
and you'll find the map application there.
info: 围炉煮茶-莎莎_主流程文本

content: <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, you found a great place for Frostia. Now, just follow the map, and you can head back to the Camp.
info: 围炉煮茶-莎莎_主流程文本
